Board games introduction: Play board games online with your friends. Only best games in a single place.
Feel free to contact us: Feel free to contact us if you have any questions or you want to support us:
Find a game or create a new one: Find a game or create a new one on 'Games' tab.
Invite your friends to play with you or: Invite your friends to play with you or fight against the artificial intelligence.
Name: Name
This is onesource: Board Games is an open source project. Our goal is to create a platform for online board games. Not only for existing games, but for any new.
Update your player name: We already generated a cool name for you. You can change it anytime together with other settings by clicking on the user icon in the header.
